channel.title: Auto-Save, Can it auto save faster?
channel.description: on servers where it auto-saves lie every couple of minutes can you make it auto save like every 45 seconds? i dont know what file to modify if you can. Anything helps, thanks.

item.title: Auto-Save, Can it auto save faster?

item.description:
@jacobhankal wrote:

i put it to 100 and the server was acting very fast. is there a way to make just the auto save go faster?

item.title: Auto-Save, Can it auto save faster?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Go to your server.java and search for

public static final int cycleTime = 500;

As you have seen in boolean process or void process in your client.java it says

//public boolean process() {// is being called regularily every 500ms
public void process() {		// is being called regularily every 500ms

The 500 stands for 500 miliseconds

you just change the

public static final int cycleTime = 500;

^ The 500

To whatever you want.

Dont forget to compile.

Read full topic
item.source: Auto-Save, Can it auto save faster?
